Campus Recreation









 

Campus Recreation









 

Campus Recreation



















 
Welcome to the NEW RecPortal!


Your RecPortal allows you to: sign your waiver (if 18 and over), discover new programs, register for events and more!
RecPortal



  







Home






Join Us
We invite you to join us for a Group Fitness class, an Intramural sport, swim at the aquatics pool, get your bike fixed at the Seawolf Cyclery, climb the Rock Wall, enjoy the Low Ropes Course, go on an outdoor trip or visit the Outdoor Resource Center and so much more. See all of our programs.
Adventure 
Make memories of a lifetime with fellow Seawolves when you join an adventure! Whether it be a hike in the redwoods, renting gear for your next big trip, or getting a bike tune-up to get you back on the road, we have you covered.
Fitness and Wellness
We have unlimited opportunities that range from dance-inspired classes to strength training. Keep your mind and body active by trying out something new!
 
 
Intramural Sports
Where fitness and fun meet to create the perfect balance of community and activity. Grab your friends or meet some new friends and sign up to participate today!

Recreation Center for You
The Campus Recreation Center has many great opportunities to stay active and have fun. With no additional costs, students can use the Fitness Center, the Mt. Everest gym, McKinley gym, locker rooms, spa, pool, game room and equipment at their own discretion.
